sentences.sContent: When encountering information such as this, your goal should be to compress it. Find ways to group information into smaller chunks of memory through pictures or mnemonics.
sentences.sContent_eng: When encountering information such as this, your goal should be to compress it. Find ways to group information into smaller chunks of memory through pictures or mnemonics.
sentences.sCn: 当你遇到类似问题的时候，你应该采用压缩的方法，找出一种方法把他们分类成一些小组，然后通过图片或者联想的方式辅助记忆。

sentences.sContent: Make it easier to pull facts and concepts out of your memory with the help of tricks such as mnemonics—which can be a sentence or phrase in which the first letter of the words joggles the memory.
sentences.sContent_eng: Make it easier to pull facts and concepts out of your memory with the help of tricks such as mnemonics—which can be a sentence or phrase in which the first letter of the words joggles the memory.
sentences.sCn: 借助一些技巧，如记忆法，将大大简化把一些事实和概念抽出大脑的过程。 它可以是一个句子或一个词组，这些词的第一个字母能唤起你的记忆。

remMethod.val: mne(记忆) + mon + ics → 记忆法

words.tran: 记忆的；助记的；记忆术的

trans.tranOther: the art or practice of improving or of aiding the memory
